version_description: adaptation for iphone X screens and bug fix
adaptation for iphone X screens and bug fix

*5.6 Redone winch. Now you can cling to other cars. Fixed a bug with a performance drop in the mud. Redone lighting and surface textures. Added new drift map. Changed the physics of cars. Work on optimization and much more
